## Xml.deleteNext() function

Remove any 'next' block (statements in a stack).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function deleteNext(xmlBlock: Element | DocumentFragment): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  xmlBlock | Element \| DocumentFragment | XML block element or an empty DocumentFragment if the block was an insertion marker. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
